channel.title: Social on Curt Poff
channel.description: Recent content in Social on Curt Poff

item.title: Meet Geordie
item.description: This poor guy showed up with an infected toe (which has since been amputated), a case of hookworms, numerous scars from god knows what kind of living conditions, and a big ol’ smile. Don’t believe me? He’s fitting in pretty well. We have an enclosed yard so he has free run to do his business. He’s attended several meet-and-greet events and has done very well at all. He’s also met all the local family members and most of their pets - doing very well at those too.

item.title: Another quality visit
item.description: Cathering Bracy paid her first visit to Oregon, and we happily played host on the Portland wing of her expedition.

item.title: Big October
item.description: October is typically a busy month in our household. Ann’s birthday, our anniversary, plus almost every other anniversary on the planet. Another big birthday this year belongs to one of my best friends: Ken Conforti. Ken and I were roommates back in the late ‘90s. He turns the big 5-0 next week.
